GlobalVariables.StudyDescription:
E2905 Treatment Form NCT00843882
Lenalidomide With or Without Epoetin Alfa in Treating Patients With Myelodysplastic Syndrome and Anemia
Source Form: NCI FormBuilder: https://formbuilder.nci.nih.gov/FormBuilder/formDetailsAction.do?method=getFormDetails&formIdSeq=0EAAA60E-08F3-6970-E044-0003BA3F9857

Description.TranslatedText: INSTRUCTIONS: Complete this form at the end of each cycle (1 cycle =3 weeks). Submit original to the ECOG Coordinating Center. Keep a copy for your files. Refer to forms packet for submission schedule

INSTRUCTIONS: Complete this form at the end of each cycle (1 cycle =3 weeks). Submit original to the ECOG Coordinating Center. Keep a copy for your files. Refer to forms packet for submission schedule

Question.TranslatedText: Please mark an 'X' if data have been amended. (Please circle amended items in red)
On Treatment Report Period (Step 2 - Choose one x)
Date of last contact or death (MM/DD/YYYY)
Date pills initially dispensed (If yes: - MM/DD/YYYY)
Total number of pills patient took home on initial dispensing date
Pill count - Number of pills remaining in the vial(s) before dispensing new pills
Number of pills lost but not taken
Was the agent administered during this reporting period? (Darbepoetin-alpha)
Date of First dose for this reporting period (MM/DD/YYYY)
Date of Last dose for this reporting period (MM/DD/YYYY)
Were there any dose modifications or additions/omissions to protocol treatment (Paxlitaxel)
Were myeloid growth factors given (this report period)
Did the patient have a deep vein thrombosis (DVT) this report period? (Report grade and attribution under thrombosis/embolism on E2905 Adverse Event Form.)
Did the patient have a pulmonary embolism this report period? (Report grade and attribution under thrombosis/embolism on E2905 Adverse Event Form.)
Was any non-protocol therapy given during protocol treatment (not previously reported)

Decode.TranslatedText: Yes, Planned (i.e., The Treatment Was Changed According To Protocol Guidelines)
Yes, Unplanned (i.e., The Treatment Change Was Not Part Of Protocol Guidelines)

CodeListItem.CodedValue: Yes, steroids given, but not continuing use

Decode.TranslatedText: Yes, Steroids Given, But Not Continuing Use

CodeListItem.CodedValue: Yes, myeloid growth factors given, but not continuing use

Decode.TranslatedText: Yes, Myeloid Growth Factors Given, But Not Continuing Use

CodeListItem.CodedValue: Yes, myeloid growth factors given, continuing use

Decode.TranslatedText: Yes, Myeloid Growth Factors Given, Continuing Use
